document_data.name: Llandrydd Wyvernheart
document_data.mainbody: '''Llandrydd Wyvernheart''' was a mercenary leader in [[Chondath]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.History:
Llandrydd led the [[Llandrydd's Steel]] company. In [[1358 DR]], he joined the [[Company of the Singing Dawn]] and [[Enhanen]]'s men to investigate rumors of a legion following the tactics of the old [[Chessentan Empire]].

He faced the [[undead]] army led by the mad cleric of [[Tempus]] [[Theodoric]].
document_data.Personality: Llandrydd was a man of authority. He was known for his speed in battle and his lethal sting, from which derived his epithet.
